name: Sentimental Gensoukyou
summary: A mysterious letter comes to Rinnosuke and written on it is, "You're boring!". Filled with anger, he travels around Gensokyo visiting all the girls in order to find the sender. Sentimental Gensoukyou is short adventure visual novel developed by Seventh Heaven Maxion using Live Maker engine. The game features 12 different scenes which can be choosen freely by player to determine route and storylines.
